companyInfo.name: Tech Gadgets Store
companyInfo.description: We are a leading retailer of the latest tech gadgets and accessories. Our mission is to provide cutting-edge technology at affordable prices.

employees.name: John Doe
employees.bio: John is a passionate software engineer who loves building scalable applications. He has been with the company for over 5 years.

employees.name: Jane Smith
employees.bio: Jane has a strong background in product development and managing teams to deliver outstanding products. She joined in 2017.

employees.name: Samuel Green
employees.bio: Samuel specializes in digital marketing strategies. He joined the company in 2018 and has helped boost brand awareness.
